Those two bucks aren't going to cut it for me. I mean, I'm a chef, not some kind of charity worker. My family's restaurant was struggling to stay afloat, but I always made sure we were fed and clothed. Now, with this experiment, I want to make sure my partner is getting paid what they're worth.

I believe that if you treat someone the way you want to be treated, they'll give their best effort. And let's face it, I've worked hard for every dollar I earn, and I expect the same from whoever pays me now. My desire is to have a fair share of the $10, so we can both keep working towards our own goals.

I intend on giving the other African American male player three times what I'm paying them - that's 3 dollars per dollar. It's not just about the money; it's about respect and fairness. Now, finally, I will give $20.
